original_title: Panique au village : La Rentrée des classes
overview: Indian and Cowboy are about to set off on a magnificent cruise on a luxury liner, but they have made a big mistake. They completely forgot that today is the first day of school! Goodbye tropical islands, our friends are back at their desks in school listening as the teacher drones on and on.
title: A Town Called Panic: Back to School Panic!
